test.name: Invalid Password With Only 4 Characters (Too Short)

kw.name: Given The user opens Chrome browser in incognito mode
Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.
Opens a new Chrome browser window in incognito mode

kw.name: And The user navigates to Facebook registration page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Sign Up for Facebook'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
Navigates to Facebook's registration page

kw.name: When The user enters a valid first name "John Crisistom"
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'John Crisistom' into text field 'name=firstname'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters first name in the registration form

kw.name: And The user enters a valid last name "Rosales"
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters last name in the registration form

kw.name: And The user selects birthdate November 17, 1994
Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=birthday_month' by value 11.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=birthday_day' by value 17.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=birthday_year' by value 1994.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.
Selects birthdate in the registration form

kw.name: And The user selects male gender
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Selects male gender option

kw.name: And The user enters a valid email "natsuxlucy02@gmail.com"
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters email in registration form

kw.name: And The user enters password "aB1@"
Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters password in registration form

kw.name: And The user clicks the submit button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Clicks the registration submit button

kw.name: Then The system should not accept the password
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Verifies password was rejected

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
